name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close and Pin Tabs Keyboard Shortcuts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides keyboard shortcuts for closing tabs to the left or right, closing all other tabs, and pinning current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides keyboard shortcuts for closing and pinning tabs.

* Alt + Shift + Left Arrow - Close all tabs to the left of the current tab.
* Alt + Shift + Right Arrow - Close all tabs to the right of the current tab.
* Alt + Shift + Up Arrow - Close all other tabs.
* Alt + Shift + Down Arrow - Pin or unpin the current tab.

Only tabs in the current window are affected.

The popup has an option to close or not close pinned tabs.

Replace 'Alt' with 'Option' on MacOS.
